title: Final sub-circuits
fullText:
Devices for protection against overload and short-circuit currents in final sub-circuits shall be one of the following types:
(a)	Miniature overcurrent circuit-breakers complying with AS/NZS 3111 or AS/NZS 60898.1.
(b)	Moulded-case circuit-breakers complying with AS/NZS IEC 60947.2.
(c)	Where supplying fixed appliances rated at 50 A per phase or greater, enclosed fuse-links complying with the IEC 60269 series of Standards and having a degree of protection of at least IP2X when the removal carrier is inserted or removed.
